content.rendered:
Fireboy and Watergirl in the Forest Temple

Fireboy and Watergirl 1: Forest Temple is an action game which should be played by 2 players to control each characters separately. In this Forest Temple there are 32 levels you need to complete. In every next unlocked level you face more and more puzzles to solve and get reach the door to the next room.

Keep in mind that Fireboy is able to step into hot lava only and Watergirl – into the water. If you step in water with Fireboy and in lava with Watergirl – you lose the game, so be concentrate not to get this out of you mind.

How to Play

Fireboy and Watergirl need to collect gems, solve incredibly challenging puzzles to get reach to the final destination. You need to move together and help each other at overcoming different kind of obstacles.

Controls

Control Fireboy – arrow keys
Control Watergirl – WAD

Platforms

Web browser
Android

Developer

Fireboy and Watergirl in the Forest Temple is developed by Oslo Albet.

Walkthrough
